text: Ana ajula jwana kulembelelaga chakutawa chakwe pa woga wakun'jogopa Allah ni (pa kusachilila) chinonyelo (Chakwe) ngawa ni jwali jwambone, kapena ajula jwana kulembelelaga chakutawa chakwe munjengwe mwa lisimbo lyaagumuchila ni gumuchila najo mâ€™moto wa Jahannama? Sano Allah jwangaajongola wandu wakulitenda lupuso
